title: Christ mysticall, or, The blessed union of Christ and his members also, An holy rapture, or, A patheticall meditation of the love of Christ : also, The Christian laid forth in his whole disposition and carriage / by J.H. D.D. B.N.
author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.
publisher: Printed by M. Flesher, and are to be sold by William Hope, Gabriel Beadle, and Nathaniel Webbe,
